Key.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String

Maximum Length: 256

Tag.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

ChannelArn.markdownDescription:
Channel ARN for the stream.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^arn:aws:ivs:[a-z0-9-]+:[0-9]+:channel/[a-zA-Z0-9-]+$  
Update requires: Replacement

Tags.description: A list of key-value pairs that contain metadata for the asset model.
Tags.markdownDescription:
A list of key-value pairs that contain metadata for the asset model.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

Arn.description: Stream Key ARN is automatically generated on creation and assigned as the unique identifier.
Arn.markdownDescription:
Stream Key ARN is automatically generated on creation and assigned as the unique identifier.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^arn:aws:ivs:[a-z0-9-]+:[0-9]+:stream-key/[a-zA-Z0-9-]+$  
Update requires: No interruption
